channel.title: CVE Feed for vantage6 -- vantage6-UI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vantage6 -- vantage6-UI

item.title: CVE-2024-22200|2024-08-01T22:35:34.944Z -- vantage6 -- vantage6-ui
item.description: vantage6-UI is the User Interface for vantage6. The docker image used to run the UI leaks the nginx version. To mitigate the vulnerability, users can run the UI as an angular application. This vulnerability was patched in 4.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-24562|2024-06-04T17:43:20.387Z -- vantage6 -- vantage6-ui
item.description: vantage6-UI is the official user interface for the vantage6 server. In affected versions a number of security headers are not set. This issue has been addressed in commit `68dfa6614` which is expected to be included in future releases. Users are advised to upgrade when a new release is made. While an upgrade path is not available users may modify the docker image build to insert the headers into nginx.
